string-array.item: Do not post to public timelines

resources.string: Click on the button to display the original toot
Write a toot and then choose Schedule from the top menu.
The scheduled date must be greater than the current hour!
Battery saver is enabled! It might not work as expected.
The time for muting should be greater than one minute.
%1$s has been muted until %2$s.\n You can unmute this account from his/her profile page.
%1$s is muted until %2$s.\n Click here to unmute the account.
The account is no longer blocked!
The account is no longer muted!
The account is no longer followed!
The toot is no longer boosted!
The toot was added to your favourites!
The toot was removed from your favourites!
An error occurred! The instance did not return an authorisation code!
The instance domain does not seem to be valid!
An error occurred while switching between accounts!
The profile data have been saved!
Are you sure this instance allows this number of characters? Usually, this value is close to 500 characters.
Visibility of the toots has been changed for the account %1$s
Instance name and screen name cannot be blank!
Add URL of media in toots
Notify when someone requests to follow you
Notify when someone boosts your status
Notify when someone favourites your status
Show confirmation dialog before adding to favourites
Automatically split toots over 500 chars in replies
You have reached the 160 characters allowed!
You have reached the 30 characters allowed!
The time must be greater than %1$s
The time must be lower than %1$s
Your API key, you can leave blank for Yandex
Notify for new toots on the home timeline
First letter in capital for replies
" Please, confirm push notifications that you want to receive. You can enable or disable these notifications later in settings (Notifications tab). "
For unread toots in home time-line?
There are %1$s of data in cache.\n\nWould you like to delete them?
No toots were found in database. Please, use the synchronize button from the menu to retrieve them.

" Only basic information from accounts are stored on the device. These data are strictly confidential and can only be used by the application. Deleting the application immediately removes these data.\n ⚠ Login and passwords are never stored. They are only used during a secure authentication (SSL) with an instance. "

" - ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used to detect if the device is connected to a WIFI network.
 - INTERNET: Used for queries to an instance.
 - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to store media or to move the app on a SD card.
 - READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to add media to toots.
 - BOOT_COMPLETED: Used to start the notification service.
 - WAKE_LOCK: Used during the notification service. "

" - Read: Read data.
 - Write: Post statuses and upload media for statuses.
 - Follow: Follow, unfollow, block, unblock.

 ⚠ These actions are carried out only when user requests them. "

" The application does not use tracking tools (audience measurement, error reporting, etc.) and does not contain any advertising.

 The use of libraries is minimized: 
 - Glide: To manage media
 - Android-Job: To manage services
 - PhotoView: To manage images
 "

" The application offers the ability to translate toots using the locale of the device and the Yandex API.\n Yandex has its proper privacy-policy which can be found here: https://yandex.ru/legal/confidential/?lang=en "
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list post new statuses, they will appear here.

" Here are some checks that might help:

 - Check there is no spelling mistakes in the instance name

 - Check that your instance is not down

 - If you use the two-factor authentication (2FA), please use the link at the bottom (once the instance name is filled)

 - You can also use this link without using the 2FA

 - If it still does not work, please raise an issue on GitLab at https://gitlab.com/tom79/mastalab/issues "
Media has been loaded. Click here to display it.
This action can be quite long. You will be notified when it will be finished.
%1$s toots out of %2$s have been exported.
Something went wrong when exporting data for %1$s
Something went wrong when exporting data!
Something went wrong when importing data!
There is an error in the regular expression!
No timelines was found on this instance!
You are going to delete %s from your followed instances.
You can send me by email the crash report. It will help to fix it :)\n\nYou can add additional content. Thank you!
Ask for sending crash reports by email?
The account is now featured on profile
The account is no longer featured on profile
No filters to display. You can create one by clicking on the \"+\" button.
Will be matched regardless of casing in text or content warning of a toot
Filtered toots will disappear irreversibly, even if filter is later removed
When the keyword or phrase is alphanumeric only, it will only be applied if it matches the whole word
One or multiple contexts where the filter should apply
There is no accounts listed for the moment!
Accounts were added to the list
You have not created a list yet. Click on the \"+\" button to add a new one.
You don\'t follow any remote instances. Click on the \"+\" button to add a new one.
Are you sure to block %s?\n\nYou will not see any content from that domain in any public timeline or in your notifications. Your followers from that domain will be removed.
The domain is no longer blocked!

Use the direct timeline prior to Mastodon 2.6

Truncate toots over \'x\' lines. Zero means disabled.
Open the menu of a toot and then choose Schedule boost.
Add description for media (for the visually impaired)

" In this field, you need to write your instance host name.
For example, if you created your account on https://mastodon.social
Just write mastodon.social (without https://)
 You can start writing first letters and names will be suggested.

 ⚠ The Login button will only work if the instance name is valid and the instance is up! "
" In this field, write the email that is attached to your Mastodon account. "
" Last step is to enter your password and click on Login. "
If you use 2FA (Two-factor authentication), you need to use this link.\nYou can also use it if you do not want to enter your credentials here.
No app supporting this link is installed on your device.
Are you sure to delete this comment?
This video contains mature or explicit content
Click here to edit the video data.
Are you sure to delete this video?
Display new toots above the \"Fetch more\" button
An error occurred when selecting the backup file!
Please, don\'t kill the app while processing. That can\'t be quite long.
There is no Internet connection. Your message has been stored in drafts.
Open Collective enables groups to quickly set up a collective, raise funds and manage them transparently.
The tracking data base has been updated!
http calls blocked by the application
The data base has been exported!

A poll cannot be attached to a direct message!

You need to keep two visible tabs!
